base.SMG_sub: Whether SMG subtraction has been performed on the dataset

clean.npix: Number of pixels in one dimension of the clean image
clean.image_rms: List of RMS noise levels in input CLEAN images [Jy / beam] (corresponding to `image_robust`)
clean.image_robust: List of robust weighting parameters for input CLEAN images (corresponding to `image_rms`)

bestfit.robust: Robust weighting parameter for best-fit clean (and assumed rave) image

frank.custom_fstar: Custom value for this amplitude, used to drive I(r=0)~0 in frank fit

bestfit.alpha: Best-fit value for the order parameter for the power spectrum's inverse Gamma prior
bestfit.wsmooth: Best-fit value for the strength of smoothing applied to the power spectrum
bestfit.method: Best-fit method: 'Normal' for in linear brighness, 'LogNormal' for logarithmic brightness
